SELECT a.shopSeq ,a.shopName ,a.shopTel ,a.shopEmail ,a.shopZip ,a.shopAddress1 ,a.shopAddress2 ,a.shopAddress3 ,a.shopAddress4 ,a.shopLatitude ,a.shopLongitude ,a.shopDescribe ,a.parkingNy ,a.wifiNy ,a.cctvNy ,a.cafeNy ,a.petNy ,a.customerFavoriteNy ,a.verifiedNy ,a.featuredNy ,a.delNy ,a.homepage ,a.youtube ,a.shopInstDate ,a.shopUpdtDate ,a.userCustomer_seq ,b.seq ,b.userId ,b.userName ,(select path from filesUploaded where pSeq = shopSeq and sort = 3001) as path1 ,(select path from filesUploaded where pSeq = shopSeq and sort = 3002) as path2 ,(select path from filesUploaded where pSeq = shopSeq and sort = 3003) as path3
AND shopSeq = #{shopSeq}

SELECT a.shopSeq ,a.shopName ,a.shopTel ,a.shopZip ,a.shopAddress1 ,a.shopAddress2 ,a.shopAddress3 ,a.shopAddress4 ,a.shopLatitude ,a.shopLongitude ,a.delNy ,a.userCustomer_seq ,b.seq ,(select path from filesUploaded where pSeq = shopSeq and sort = 3001) as path
SELECT path ,pSeq FROM filesUploaded WHERE 1=1 AND type = 3000 order by sort asc

SELECT a.shopSeq ,a.youtube ,a.userCustomer_seq ,b.seq ,b.userId ,b.userName FROM shop as a left join usercustomer b on a.userCustomer_seq = b.seq WHERE 1=1 AND a.userCustomer_seq = #{userCustomer_seq}

SELECT a.shopSeq ,a.mondayNy ,a.tuesdayNy ,a.wednesdayNy ,a.thursdayNy ,a.fridayNy ,a.saturdayNy ,a.sundayNy ,a.mondayOpentime ,a.mondayClosetime ,a.tuesdayOpentime ,a.tuesdayClosetime ,a.wednesdayOpentime ,a.wednesdayClosetime ,a.thursdayOpentime ,a.thurdayClosetime ,a.fridayOpentime ,a.fridayClosetime ,a.saturdayOpentime ,a.saturdayClosetime ,a.sundayOpentime ,a.sundayClosetime ,a.userCustomer_seq ,b.seq ,b.userId ,b.userName FROM shop as a left join usercustomer b on a.userCustomer_seq = b.seq WHERE 1=1 AND a.userCustomer_seq = #{userCustomer_seq}

SELECT a.shopSeq ,a.shopDescribe ,a.homepage ,a.userCustomer_seq ,b.seq ,b.userId ,b.userName ,(select path from filesUploaded where pSeq = shopSeq and type = 2000) as path FROM shop as a left join usercustomer b on a.userCustomer_seq = b.seq WHERE 1=1 AND a.userCustomer_seq = #{userCustomer_seq}
